ygData.subject: Re: Level 8 Spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Get shock of Ice.   Much better mana/dmg ratio, plus I seemed to have a quicker casting time.  I m at lvl 16 and I still have it memorize (though I very rarely
ygData.messageBody:
Get shock of Ice. Much better mana/dmg ratio, plus I seemed to have a
quicker casting time. I'm at lvl 16 and I still have it memorize (though I
very rarely use it).. I stopped memorizing Fire Bolt at level 12, was just
no need for it anymore.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard


-----Original Message-----
From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, May 01, 1999 3:57 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Level 8 Spells


>From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
>
>Sorry, I know this has been discussed before, but I will soon be level 8
>and want to purchase just one new spell, saving up for level 12 spells.
>What is the best DD spell? Was planning on Fire Bolt, but would Shock of
>Ice be better? I heard it had a better damage per mana ratio, but does Fire
>Bolt have better range? Thanks for any info.
>
>Greg (Kronan)
>
